text:
Irvins Salted Egg THE BEST !! I'm obsessed with the salted eggs! They're so rich and savory, with just the right amount of saltiness. A must-try!!!
The Staff, Ms Nafisah at West Gate Branch warm hospitality and welcoming atmosphere made me feel right at home. Kudos to Ms Nafisah and incredibly friendly and attentive! Her exceptional service deserves commendation!!!!

Quite nice and special snacks, always enjoyed them in past few year's in Singapore. Salted egg flavor is the favorite forever!
Got warm welcome and great service in this store, love it!
The salesperson was friendly & patiently attended to my queries. Bought the classic box & classic mix.
Love Ivrins salted egg fish skin, my to go snack for family and friends! Thank you for the great service by Nafisha üèÜ

"I had the pleasure of being helped by Nafisah today, she is so friendly making it easy for me to get what I need. It's not every day you come across such positive energy, and I really appreciated her attention and the warm smile she gave throughout the transaction. Thank you for making my day better!"
